resources.string: Invalid folder name; failed to create that folder. Folder will not be changed.
Cannot create file method-dump.txt in the folder. Folder will not be changed.
Warning: The project was not closed properly after last use. There might be data loss because of this.
MCPE method dump cannot be found on your device. Perhaps you changed your app directory?
Use Options -> Import ModPE function list to download the newest method list.
